author: evenisse
msg: [MRELEASE-6] [MRELEASE-168] Commit pom files even if the project use a flat directory structure. The use must choose to commit files by modules instead of an atomic commit.

author: pmcmahan
msg: MYFACES-1592 try to convert a tag's "value" attribute to a Boolean when necessary, e.g. selectBooleanCheckbox.
Thanks Martin Haimberger for the patch.
